DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine residual anticoagulatory effects of a prophylactic or therapeutic fondaparinux treatment i.e. prior to surgery/intervention, after pause of therapy etc.
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Residual Anticoagulatory Effects of Fondaparinux
DOC.criteria: Fondaparinux therapy for at least 3 days Age < 18 years Hemodialysis
